newsitem.title: SPAIN: FORECAST-Spanish key rate seen held at 6.75 pct.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Spanish key rate seen held at 6.75 pct.

text.p: The Bank of Spain will leave its key money market rate unchanged at 6.75 percent at Wednesday's regular repo auction, ten economists agreed on Tuesday.
Some of the financial analysts surveyed by Reuters said the Bank of Spain probably has a further 25 basis point margin to reduce interest rates before the end of the year.
The central bank has lowered its key rate six times since the start of 1996. It last cut rates by 50 basis points on October 3.
